divs: sighting detailsi went outside about 12:20 on 9\2 2013. i noticed a light to the northeast about 4 or 5 times the size of a star. it was moving slightly and pulsating what looked like white and yellow or orange light. i thought it might be a drone since i knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter. my wife saw it too and went to get her tablet to record video of the object. i also called my daughter to see it she also could not explain what we were seeing. it looked unlike anything we had ever seen in the sky. as i was recording the object my wife noticed another one to the east and at some point a third came into view between the other two but further off in the distance. when i zoomed in on the first object it looked like a diamond shape that changed to a square as well as changed colors and intensity. during the recordings a second light appeared which made me wonder if the light was the object or just a light on a bigger object. when both lights were visible it looked like it could have been a horse shoe shape with light on each end. it was hard to tell all i know is i never saw anything like it before. i watched for over two hours and they were still there when i went to bed at 2:45
trends: There has been one other sighting in Georgetown
There were no other sightings in Georgetown on or around September 2nd 2013
